trans-unit.source: Code must run error free and not rely on warnings and notices to be hidden to meet this requirement. For instance, never access a variable that you did not set yourself (such as $_POST array keys) without first checking to see that it isset().
trans-unit.target: 코드는 오류없이 실행되어야하며이 요구 사항을 충족하기 위해 경고 및 알림을 숨기지 않아야합니다. 예를 들어, 자신이 직접 설정하지 않은 변수 (예 : $_POST 배열 키)에 먼저 액세스하여 isset() 인지 확인 하지 마십시오 .

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter 4 has been designed to be easy to extend or build upon.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter 4 has been designed to be easy to extend or build upon.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter Does Not Require a Template Engine
CodeIgniter also permits you to remap your URIs using its URI Routing feature.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter에서는 URI 라우팅 기능을 사용하여 URI 를 다시 매핑 할 수도 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter also provides a Response class that is an object-oriented representation of the HTTP response. This gives you an easy and powerful way to construct your response to the client:
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter also provides a Response class that is an object-oriented representation of the HTTP response. This gives you an easy and powerful way to construct your response to the client:

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter also returns a status code whenever a portion of the core calls exit(). This exit status code is separate from the HTTP status code, and serves as a notice to other processes that may be watching of whether the script completed successfully, or if not, what kind of problem it encountered that caused it to abort. These values are defined in application/config/constants.php. While exit status codes are most useful in CLI settings, returning the proper code helps server software keep track of your scripts and the health of your application.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 코어의 일부가 exit() 호출 할 때마다 상태 코드를 반환합니다 . 이 종료 상태 코드는 HTTP 상태 코드와 별개이며 스크립트가 성공적으로 완료되었는지 여부와 그렇지 않은 경우 어떤 종류의 문제로 인해 중단되었는지 알 수있는 다른 프로세스에 대한 통지 역할을합니다. 이 값들은 application / config / constants.php에 정의되어 있습니다. 종료 상태 코드는 CLI 설정에서 가장 유용하지만 적절한 코드를 반환하면 서버 소프트웨어가 스크립트와 응용 프로그램의 상태를 추적하는 데 도움이됩니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter also supports “tempdata”, or session data with a specific expiration time. After the value expires, or the session expires or is deleted, the value is automatically removed.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 또한“tempdata”또는 특정 만료 시간의 세션 데이터를 지원합니다. 값이 만료되거나 세션이 만료되거나 삭제되면 값이 자동으로 제거됩니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter always loads the global config file first (i.e., the one in application/config/), then tries to load the configuration files for the current environment. This means you are not obligated to place all of your configuration files in an environment folder. Only the files that change per environment. Additionally you don’t have to copy all the config items in the environment config file. Only the config items that you wish to change for your environment. The config items declared in your environment folders always overwrite those in your global config files.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 항상 전역 구성 파일을 먼저 (예 : application / config /에있는 파일)로드 한 다음 현재 환경에 대한 구성 파일을로드하려고합니다. 즉, 모든 구성 파일을 환경 폴더에 배치 할 필요는 없습니다 . 환경마다 변경되는 파일 만 또한 환경 구성 파일의 모든 구성 항목 을 복사 할 필요는 없습니다 . 환경에 맞게 변경하려는 구성 항목 만 환경 폴더에 선언 된 구성 항목은 항상 전역 구성 파일의 구성 항목을 덮어 씁니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter automatically loads the primary config file (application/config/config.php), so you will only need to load a config file if you have created your own.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 기본 구성 파일 (application / config / config.php)을 자동으로로드하므로 직접 생성 한 구성 파일 만로드하면됩니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter automatically logs any show_404() calls. Setting the optional second parameter to FALSE will skip logging.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 모든 show_404() 호출을 자동으로 기록 합니다. 선택적 두 번째 매개 변수를 FALSE로 설정하면 로깅을 건너 뜁니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter builds error reporting into your system through Exceptions, both the SPL collection, as well as a few custom exceptions that are provided by the framework. Depending on your environment’s setup, the the default action when an error or exception is thrown is to display a detailed error report unless the application is running under the production environment. In this case, a more generic message is displayed to keep the best user experience for your users.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter builds error reporting into your system through Exceptions, both the SPL collection, as well as a few custom exceptions that are provided by the framework. Depending on your environment’s setup, the the default action when an error or exception is thrown is to display a detailed error report unless the application is running under the production environment. In this case, a more generic message is displayed to keep the best user experience for your users.

trans-unit.target: 사이트 루트 URL 만 요청하는 경우와 같이 URI가없는 경우 기본 컨트롤러를로드하도록 CodeIgniter에 지시 할 수 있습니다. 기본 컨트롤러를 지정하려면 application / config / routes.php 파일을 열고이 변수를 설정하십시오 :

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter comes with a Cross Site Scripting filter. This filter looks for commonly used techniques to embed malicious JavaScript into your data, or other types of code that attempt to hijack cookies or do other malicious things. The XSS Filter is described here.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 Cross Site Scripting 필터와 함께 제공됩니다. 이 필터는 악성 JavaScript를 데이터 또는 쿠키를 가로 채거나 다른 악의적 인 일을 시도하는 다른 유형의 코드에 포함시키는 데 일반적으로 사용되는 기술을 찾습니다. XSS 필터는 여기 에 설명되어 있습니다 .

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter comes with a Cross Site Scripting prevention filter, which looks for commonly used techniques to trigger JavaScript or other types of code that attempt to hijack cookies or do other malicious things. If anything disallowed is encountered it is rendered safe by converting the data to character entities.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 크로스 사이트 스크립팅 방지 필터를 제공합니다.이 필터는 JavaScript 또는 쿠키를 가로 채거나 다른 악의적 인 일을 시도하는 다른 유형의 코드를 트리거하는 데 일반적으로 사용되는 기술을 찾습니다. 허용되지 않는 것이 있으면 데이터를 문자 엔터티로 변환하여 안전하게 렌더링됩니다.

trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter comes with a few session storage drivers, that you can see in the last section of the table of contents:

trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter에는 몇 가지 세션 스토리지 드라이버가 제공됩니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter comes with a full-featured and very fast abstracted database class that supports both traditional structures and Query Builder patterns. The database functions offer clear, simple syntax.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 전통적인 구조와 Query Builder 패턴을 모두 지원하는 완전한 기능을 갖춘 매우 빠른 추상 데이터베이스 클래스와 함께 제공됩니다. 데이터베이스 함수는 명확하고 간단한 구문을 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter comes with an “Auto-load” feature that permits libraries, helpers, and models to be initialized automatically every time the system runs. If you need certain resources globally throughout your application you should consider auto-loading them for convenience.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter에는 시스템이 실행될 때마다 라이브러리, 헬퍼 및 모델을 자동으로 초기화 할 수있는 "자동로드"기능이 있습니다. 응용 프로그램 전체에 특정 리소스가 필요한 경우 편의상 자동로드를 고려해야합니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter comes with full-range of libraries that enable the most commonly needed web development tasks, like accessing a database, sending email, validating form data, maintaining sessions, manipulating images, working with XML-RPC data and much more.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter에는 데이터베이스 액세스, 전자 메일 보내기, 양식 데이터 유효성 검사, 세션 유지 관리, 이미지 조작, XML-RPC 데이터 작업 등 가장 일반적으로 필요한 웹 개발 작업을 지원하는 광범위한 라이브러리가 포함되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter comes with helper methods that let you fetch POST, GET, COOKIE or SERVER items. The main advantage of using the provided methods rather than fetching an item directly ($_POST['something']) is that the methods will check to see if the item is set and return NULL if not. This lets you conveniently use data without having to test whether an item exists first. In other words, normally you might do something like this:
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 POST, GET, COOKIE 또는 SERVER 항목을 가져올 수있는 도우미 메소드와 함께 제공됩니다. 항목을 직접 가져 오는 대신 제공된 메소드를 사용하는 주된 장점 ( $_POST['something'] )은 메소드가 항목이 설정되어 있는지 확인하고 그렇지 않은 경우 NULL을 리턴한다는 것입니다. 따라서 항목이 먼저 존재하는지 테스트하지 않고도 편리하게 데이터를 사용할 수 있습니다. 즉, 일반적으로 다음과 같은 작업을 수행 할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter comes with rich tools for modeling and working with your database tables and records.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter comes with rich tools for modeling and working with your database tables and records.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter comes with tools to restructure or seed your database.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter comes with tools to restructure or seed your database.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter does not require you to use this class since using pure PHP in your view pages (for instance using the View renderer ) lets them run a little faster. However, some developers prefer to use some form of template engine if they work with designers who they feel would find some confusion working with PHP.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter does not require you to use this class since using pure PHP in your view pages (for instance using the View renderer ) lets them run a little faster. However, some developers prefer to use some form of template engine if they work with designers who they feel would find some confusion working with PHP.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter does not require you to use this class since using pure PHP in your view pages lets them run a little faster. However, some developers prefer to use a template engine if they work with designers who they feel would find some confusion working with PHP.
trans-unit.target: 뷰 페이지에서 순수 PHP를 사용하면 조금 더 빠르게 실행될 수 있으므로 CodeIgniter에서는 이 클래스를 사용할 필요 가 없습니다 . 그러나 일부 개발자는 PHP와 혼동을 느끼는 디자이너와 함께 작업하는 경우 템플릿 엔진을 선호합니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter does not load Helper Files by default, so the first step in using a Helper is to load it. Once loaded, it becomes globally available in your controller and views.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter does not load Helper Files by default, so the first step in using a Helper is to load it. Once loaded, it becomes globally available in your controller and views.

trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 기본적으로 헬퍼 파일을로드하지 않으므로 헬퍼 사용의 첫 번째 단계는 헬퍼 파일을로드하는 것입니다. 일단로드되면 컨트롤러 및 보기 에서 전체적으로 사용할 수있게됩니다 .

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter expects .env to be at the root of your project alongside the system and app directories. There is a template file distributed with CodeIgniter that’s located at the project root named env (Notice there’s no dot (.) at the start?). It has a large collection of variables your project might use that have been assigned empty, dummy, or default values. You can use this file as a starting place for your application by either renaming the template to .env, or by making a copy of it named .env.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter expects .env to be at the root of your project alongside the system and app directories. There is a template file distributed with CodeIgniter that’s located at the project root named env (Notice there’s no dot (.) at the start?). It has a large collection of variables your project might use that have been assigned empty, dummy, or default values. You can use this file as a starting place for your application by either renaming the template to .env, or by making a copy of it named .env.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter features wrappers around some of the most popular forms of fast and dynamic caching. All but file-based caching require specific server requirements, and a Fatal Exception will be thrown if server requirements are not met.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 가장 널리 사용되는 빠르고 동적 인 캐싱 형태에 대한 래퍼를 제공합니다. 파일 기반 캐싱을 제외한 모든 서버에는 특정 서버 요구 사항이 필요하며 서버 요구 사항이 충족되지 않으면 치명적인 예외가 발생합니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter gives access to its session data through the same means, as it uses the session handlers’ mechanism provided by PHP. Using session data is as simple as manipulating (read, set and unset values) the $_SESSION array.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 PHP에서 제공하는 세션 핸들러 메커니즘을 사용하는 것과 동일한 방법으로 세션 데이터에 액세스합니다. 세션 데이터를 사용하는 것은 $_SESSION 배열 을 조작 (읽기, 설정 및 설정 해제)하는 것만 큼 간단 합니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter gives you access to a Query Builder class. This pattern allows information to be retrieved, inserted, and updated in your database with minimal scripting. In some cases only one or two lines of code are necessary to perform a database action. CodeIgniter does not require that each database table be its own class file. It instead provides a more simplified interface.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter를 사용하면 Query Builder 클래스에 액세스 할 수 있습니다. 이 패턴을 사용하면 최소한의 스크립팅으로 데이터베이스에서 정보를 검색, 삽입 및 업데이트 할 수 있습니다. 어떤 경우에는 데이터베이스 작업을 수행하기 위해 한두 줄의 코드 만 필요합니다. CodeIgniter는 각 데이터베이스 테이블이 자체 클래스 파일 일 필요는 없습니다. 대신 더 간단한 인터페이스를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter gives you access to a Query Builder class. This pattern allows information to be retrieved, inserted, and updated in your database with minimal scripting. In some cases, only one or two lines of code are necessary to perform a database action. CodeIgniter does not require that each database table be its own class file. It instead provides a more simplified interface.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter gives you access to a Query Builder class. This pattern allows information to be retrieved, inserted, and updated in your database with minimal scripting. In some cases, only one or two lines of code are necessary to perform a database action. CodeIgniter does not require that each database table be its own class file. It instead provides a more simplified interface.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter has a Form Validation Library that assists you in validating, filtering, and prepping your data.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter에는 데이터 유효성 검사, 필터링 및 준비를 지원 하는 양식 유효성 검사 라이브러리 가 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter has a Benchmarking class that is always active, enabling the time difference between any two marked points to be calculated.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter에는 항상 활성화되어있는 벤치마킹 클래스가있어 표시된 두 지점 사이의 시차를 계산할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter has a Friendly Community of Users
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 사용자 친화적 인 커뮤니티를 가지고 있습니다

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter has a config file that lets you store your database connection values (username, password, database name, etc.). The config file is located at app/Config/Database.php. You can also set database connection values in the .env file. See below for more details.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter has a config file that lets you store your database connection values (username, password, database name, etc.). The config file is located at app/Config/Database.php. You can also set database connection values in the .env file. See below for more details.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter has a config file that lets you store your database connection values (username, password, database name, etc.). The config file is located at application/config/database.php. You can also set database connection values for specific environments by placing database.php in the respective environment config folder.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter에는 데이터베이스 연결 값 (사용자 이름, 비밀번호, 데이터베이스 이름 등)을 저장할 수있는 구성 파일이 있습니다. 설정 파일은 application / config / database.php에 있습니다. database.php 를 해당 환경 구성 폴더 에 배치하여 특정 환경 에 대한 데이터베이스 연결 값을 설정할 수도 있습니다 .

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter has a fairly loose approach to MVC since Models are not required. If you don’t need the added separation, or find that maintaining models requires more complexity than you want, you can ignore them and build your application minimally using Controllers and Views. CodeIgniter also enables you to incorporate your own existing scripts, or even develop core libraries for the system, enabling you to work in a way that makes the most sense to you.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 모델이 필요하지 않기 때문에 MVC에 대한 접근 방법이 상당히 느슨합니다. 추가 분리가 필요하지 않거나 모델을 유지 관리하는 데 원하는 것보다 더 복잡해야하는 경우 컨트롤러 및 뷰를 사용하여 모델을 무시하고 응용 프로그램을 최소한으로 구축 할 수 있습니다. 또한 CodeIgniter를 사용하면 기존 스크립트를 통합하거나 시스템의 핵심 라이브러리를 개발하여 자신에게 가장 적합한 방식으로 작업 할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter has a powerful form validation library as demonstrated above. You can read more about this library here.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter에는 위에서 설명한 것처럼 강력한 형식 유효성 검사 라이브러리가 있습니다. 당신이 읽을 수 있습니다 여기에이 라이브러리에 대한 자세한 .

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter has a powerful validation library as demonstrated above. You can read more about this library here.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter has a powerful validation library as demonstrated above. You can read more about this library here.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter has an output class that takes care of sending your final rendered data to the web browser automatically. More information on this can be found in the Views and Output Class pages. In some cases, however, you might want to post-process the finalized data in some way and send it to the browser yourself. CodeIgniter permits you to add a method named _output() to your controller that will receive the finalized output data.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter에는 최종 렌더링 된 데이터를 웹 브라우저에 자동으로 전송하는 출력 클래스가 있습니다. 이에 대한 자세한 정보는 Views and Output Class 페이지 에서 찾을 수 있습니다 . 그러나 어떤 경우에는 최종 데이터를 어떤 방식 으로든 후 처리하여 브라우저로 직접 보낼 수 있습니다. CodeIgniter를 사용하면 최종 출력 데이터를 수신 할 컨트롤러에 _output() 이라는 메소드를 추가 할 수 있습니다 .

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter has been built to make testing both the framework and your application as simple as possible. Support for PHPUnit is built in, and the framework provides a number of convenient helper methods to make testing every aspect of your application as painless as possible.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter has been built to make testing both the framework and your application as simple as possible. Support for PHPUnit is built in, and the framework provides a number of convenient helper methods to make testing every aspect of your application as painless as possible.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter intentionally does not provide an internal authentication or authorization class. There are a number of great third-party modules that provide these services, as well as resources in the community for writing your own. The following are recommended guidelines to encourage consistency among developers of modules, projects, and the framework itself.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter intentionally does not provide an internal authentication or authorization class. There are a number of great third-party modules that provide these services, as well as resources in the community for writing your own. The following are recommended guidelines to encourage consistency among developers of modules, projects, and the framework itself.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter is a community driven project and accepts contributions of code and documentation from the community. These contributions are made in the form of Issues or Pull Requests on the CodeIgniter4 repository on GitHub.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter is a community driven project and accepts contributions of code and documentation from the community. These contributions are made in the form of Issues or Pull Requests on the CodeIgniter4 repository on GitHub.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter is a dynamically instantiated, loosely coupled system with high component singularity. It strives for simplicity, flexibility, and high performance in a small footprint package.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 구성 요소 특이성이 높은 동적으로 인스턴스화되고 느슨하게 결합 된 시스템입니다. 작은 풋 프린트 패키지에서 단순성, 유연성 및 고성능을 추구합니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter is a toolkit for people who build web applications using PHP. Its goal is to enable you to develop projects much faster than you could if you were writing code from scratch, by providing a rich set of libraries for commonly needed tasks, as well as a simple interface and logical structure to access these libraries. CodeIgniter lets you creatively focus on your project by minimizing the amount of code needed for a given task.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 PHP를 사용하여 웹 응용 프로그램을 작성하는 사람들을위한 툴킷입니다. 그 목적은 일반적으로 필요한 작업을위한 풍부한 라이브러리 세트와 이러한 라이브러리에 액세스 할 수있는 간단한 인터페이스 및 논리적 구조를 제공하여 코드를 처음부터 작성했을 때보 다 훨씬 빠르게 프로젝트를 개발할 수 있도록하는 것입니다. CodeIgniter를 사용하면 주어진 작업에 필요한 코드 양을 최소화하여 프로젝트에 창의적으로 집중할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter is an Application Development Framework - a toolkit - for people who build web sites using PHP. Its goal is to enable you to develop projects much faster than you could if you were writing code from scratch, by providing a rich set of libraries for commonly needed tasks, as well as a simple interface and logical structure to access these libraries. CodeIgniter lets you creatively focus on your project by minimizing the amount of code needed for a given task.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter is an Application Development Framework - a toolkit - for people who build web sites using PHP. Its goal is to enable you to develop projects much faster than you could if you were writing code from scratch, by providing a rich set of libraries for commonly needed tasks, as well as a simple interface and logical structure to access these libraries. CodeIgniter lets you creatively focus on your project by minimizing the amount of code needed for a given task.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter is based on the Model-View-Controller development pattern. MVC is a software approach that separates application logic from presentation. In practice, it permits your web pages to contain minimal scripting since the presentation is separate from the PHP scripting.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 Model-View-Controller 개발 패턴을 기반으로합니다. MVC는 응용 프로그램 논리와 프레젠테이션을 분리하는 소프트웨어 접근 방식입니다. 실제로는 프리젠 테이션이 PHP 스크립팅과 분리되어 있으므로 웹 페이지에 최소한의 스크립팅을 포함 할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter lets you build error reporting into your applications using the functions described below. In addition, it has an error logging class that permits error and debugging messages to be saved as text files.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter를 사용하면 아래 설명 된 기능을 사용하여 응용 프로그램에 오류보고를 작성할 수 있습니다. 또한 오류 및 디버깅 메시지를 텍스트 파일로 저장할 수있는 오류 로깅 클래스가 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter lets you cache your pages in order to achieve maximum performance.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter를 사용하면 최대 성능을 달성하기 위해 페이지를 캐시 할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter lets you set as many validation rules as you need for a given field, cascading them in order, and it even lets you prep and pre-process the field data at the same time. To set validation rules you will use the set_rules() method:
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter를 사용하면 주어진 필드에 대해 필요한만큼 많은 유효성 검사 규칙을 설정하고 순서대로 연결할 수 있으며 필드 데이터를 동시에 준비하고 사전 처리 할 수도 있습니다. 유효성 검사 규칙을 설정하려면 set_rules() 메서드를 사용하십시오 .

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter lets you set as many validation rules as you need for a given field, cascading them in order. To set validation rules you will use the setRule(), setRules(), or withRequest() methods.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter lets you set as many validation rules as you need for a given field, cascading them in order. To set validation rules you will use the setRule() , setRules() , or withRequest() methods.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter libraries should take advantage of corresponding language files whenever possible.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter 라이브러리는 가능할 때마다 해당 언어 파일을 활용해야합니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter logs error messages, according to the settings in app/Config/Logger.php.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter logs error messages, according to the settings in app/Config/Logger.php .

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter makes it easy to create RESTful APIs for your resources, with its resource routes and ResourceController.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter makes it easy to create RESTful APIs for your resources, with its resource routes and ResourceController .

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter makes it simple and painless to set Environment Variables by using a “dotenv” file. The term comes from the file name, which starts with a dot before the text “env”.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter makes it simple and painless to set Environment Variables by using a “dotenv” file. The term comes from the file name, which starts with a dot before the text “env”.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter makes working with files uploaded through a form much simpler and more secure than using PHP’s $_FILES array directly. This extends the File class and thus gains all of the features of that class.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter makes working with files uploaded through a form much simpler and more secure than using PHP’s $_FILES array directly. This extends the File class and thus gains all of the features of that class.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter optionally supports this capability, which can be enabled in your application/config.php file. If you open your config file you’ll see these items:
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 선택적으로이 기능을 지원하며이 기능은 application / config.php 파일 에서 활성화 할 수 있습니다 . 구성 파일을 열면 다음 항목이 표시됩니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter places the result of EACH query into its own cache file. Sets of cache files are further organized into sub-folders corresponding to your controller functions. To be precise, the sub-folders are named identically to the first two segments of your URI (the controller class name and function name).
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 각 쿼리 결과를 자체 캐시 파일에 저장합니다. 캐시 파일 세트는 컨트롤러 기능에 해당하는 하위 폴더로 구성됩니다. 정확하게 말하면, 하위 폴더의 이름은 URI의 첫 두 세그먼트 (컨트롤러 클래스 이름 및 함수 이름)와 동일하게 지정됩니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter provides CSRF protection out of the box, which will get automatically triggered for every non-GET HTTP request, but also needs you to create your submit forms in a certain way. This is explained in the Security Library documentation.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 기본적으로 CSRF 보호 기능을 제공하며, 이는 모든 비 GET HTTP 요청에 대해 자동으로 트리거되지만 특정 방식으로 제출 양식을 작성해야합니다. 보안 라이브러리 설명서에 설명되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter provides a File class that wraps the SplFileInfo class and provides some additional convenience methods. This class is the base class for uploaded files and images.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter provides a File class that wraps the SplFileInfo class and provides some additional convenience methods. This class is the base class for uploaded files and images.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter provides a comprehensive data validation class that helps minimize the amount of code you’ll write.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter provides a comprehensive data validation class that helps minimize the amount of code you’ll write.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter provides a comprehensive form validation and data prepping class that helps minimize the amount of code you’ll write.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 작성하는 코드의 양을 최소화하는 데 도움이되는 포괄적 인 양식 유효성 검사 및 데이터 준비 클래스를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter provides a few functions and variables that are globally defined, and are available to you at any point. These do not require loading any additional libraries or helpers.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter provides a few functions and variables that are globally defined, and are available to you at any point. These do not require loading any additional libraries or helpers.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter provides a fully-localized, immutable, date/time class that is built on PHP’s DateTime object, but uses the Intl extension’s features to convert times across timezones and display the output correctly for different locales. This class is the Time class and lives in the CodeIgniter\I18n namespace.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter provides a fully-localized, immutable, date/time class that is built on PHP’s DateTime object, but uses the Intl extension’s features to convert times across timezones and display the output correctly for different locales. This class is the Time class and lives in the CodeIgniter\I18n namespace.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter provides a library to help you with certain common functions that you may want to use with Javascript. Please note that CodeIgniter does not require the jQuery library to run, and that any scripting library will work equally well. The jQuery library is simply presented as a convenience if you choose to use it.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 Javascript와 함께 사용할 수있는 특정 공통 기능을 지원하는 라이브러리를 제공합니다. CodeIgniter는 jQuery 라이브러리를 실행할 필요가 없으며 스크립팅 라이브러리도 동일하게 작동합니다. jQuery 라이브러리는 사용하기로 선택하면 편의상 제공됩니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter provides a set of compatibility functions that enable you to use functions what are otherwise natively available in PHP, but only in higher versions or depending on a certain extension.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 PHP에서 기본적으로 사용할 수있는 기능을 사용할 수 있도록 호환성 기능 세트를 제공하지만 상위 버전에서만 또는 특정 확장명에 따라 다릅니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter provides a very flexible autoloader that can be used with very little configuration. It can locate individual non-namespaced classes, namespaced classes that adhere to PSR4 autoloading directory structures, and will even attempt to locate classes in common directories (like Controllers, Models, etc).
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter provides a very flexible autoloader that can be used with very little configuration. It can locate individual non-namespaced classes, namespaced classes that adhere to PSR4 autoloading directory structures, and will even attempt to locate classes in common directories (like Controllers, Models, etc).

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter provides a very simple, but flexible pagination library that is simple to theme, works with the model, and capable of supporting multiple paginators on a single page.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter provides a very simple, but flexible pagination library that is simple to theme, works with the model, and capable of supporting multiple paginators on a single page.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter provides an object oriented solution for working with URI’s in your application. Using this makes it simple to ensure that the structure is always correct, no matter how complex the URI might be, as well as adding relative URI to an existing one and have it resolved safely and correctly.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter provides an object oriented solution for working with URI’s in your application. Using this makes it simple to ensure that the structure is always correct, no matter how complex the URI might be, as well as adding relative URI to an existing one and have it resolved safely and correctly.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter provides several tools to help you localize your application for different languages. While full localization of an application is a complex subject, it’s simple to swap out strings in your application with different supported languages.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter provides several tools to help you localize your application for different languages. While full localization of an application is a complex subject, it’s simple to swap out strings in your application with different supported languages.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter provides the following functions and tips to assist you in this process:
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는이 과정에서 도움이되는 다음 기능과 팁을 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter provides two separate tools to help you benchmark your code and test different options: the Timer and the Iterator. The Timer allows you to easily calculate the time between two points in the execution of your script. The Iterator allows you to set up several variations and runs those tests, recording performance and memory statistics to help you decide which version is the best.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter provides two separate tools to help you benchmark your code and test different options: the Timer and the Iterator. The Timer allows you to easily calculate the time between two points in the execution of your script. The Iterator allows you to set up several variations and runs those tests, recording performance and memory statistics to help you decide which version is the best.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter reads its routing rules from top to bottom and routes the request to the first matching rule. Each rule is a regular expression (left-side) mapped to a controller and method name separated by slashes (right-side). When a request comes in, CodeIgniter looks for the first match, and calls the appropriate controller and method, possibly with arguments.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 라우팅 규칙을 위에서 아래로 읽고 요청을 첫 번째 일치 규칙으로 라우팅합니다. 각 규칙은 컨트롤러와 메서드 이름에 슬래시 (오른쪽)로 매핑 된 정규식 (왼쪽)입니다. 요청이 들어 오면 CodeIgniter는 첫 번째 일치 항목을 찾고 인수와 함께 적절한 컨트롤러와 메소드를 호출합니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter recommends PHP 5.6 or newer to be used, but it should be compatible with PHP 5.3.7. Your code must either be compatible with this requirement, provide a suitable fallback, or be an optional feature that dies quietly without affecting a user’s application.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 PHP 5.6 이상을 사용할 것을 권장하지만 PHP 5.3.7과 호환되어야합니다. 코드는이 요구 사항과 호환되거나 적절한 폴백을 제공하거나 사용자 응용 프로그램에 영향을주지 않고 조용히 죽을 수있는 선택적 기능이어야합니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter requires that a PHP script matching the environment’s name is located under APPPATH/Config/Boot. These files can contain any customizations that you would like to make for your environment, whether it’s updating the error display settings, loading additional developer tools, or anything else. These are automatically loaded by the system. The following files are already created in a fresh install:

These files can contain any customizations that you would like to make for your environment, whether it’s updating the error display settings, loading additional developer tools, or anything else. These are automatically loaded by the system. The following files are already created in a fresh install:

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter ships with a number of tools to help you test and debug your application thoroughly. The following sections should get you quickly testing your applications.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter ships with a number of tools to help you test and debug your application thoroughly. The following sections should get you quickly testing your applications.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter ships with several commands that are available from the command line to help you work with migrations. These tools are not required to use migrations but might make things easier for those of you that wish to use them. The tools primarily provide access to the same methods that are available within the MigrationRunner class.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter ships with several commands that are available from the command line to help you work with migrations. These tools are not required to use migrations but might make things easier for those of you that wish to use them. The tools primarily provide access to the same methods that are available within the MigrationRunner class.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter ships with several Collectors that, as the name implies, collect data to display on the toolbar. You can easily make your own to customize the toolbar. To determine which collectors are shown, again head over to the app/Config/Toolbar.php configuration file:
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter ships with several Collectors that, as the name implies, collect data to display on the toolbar. You can easily make your own to customize the toolbar. To determine which collectors are shown, again head over to the app/Config/Toolbar.php configuration file:

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter supports “flashdata”, or session data that will only be available for the next request, and is then automatically cleared.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 "flashdata"또는 다음 요청에서만 사용할 수있는 세션 데이터를 지원하고 자동으로 지워집니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter supports Entity classes as a first-class citizen in it’s database layer, while keeping them completely optional to use. They are commonly used as part of the Repository pattern, but can be used directly with the Model if that fits your needs better.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter supports Entity classes as a first-class citizen in it’s database layer, while keeping them completely optional to use. They are commonly used as part of the Repository pattern, but can be used directly with the Model if that fits your needs better.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter supports a form of code modularization to help you create reusable code. Modules are typically centered around a specific subject, and can be thought of as mini-applications within your larger application. Any of the standard file types within the framework are supported, like controllers, models, views, config files, helpers, language files, etc. Modules may contain as few, or as many, of these as you like.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter supports a form of code modularization to help you create reusable code. Modules are typically centered around a specific subject, and can be thought of as mini-applications within your larger application. Any of the standard file types within the framework are supported, like controllers, models, views, config files, helpers, language files, etc. Modules may contain as few, or as many, of these as you like.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter supports a simple, yet very flexible, layout system that makes it simple to use one or more base page layouts across your application. Layouts support sections of content that can be inserted from any view being rendered. You could create different layouts to support one-column, two-column, blog archive pages, and more. Layouts are never directly rendered. Instead, you render a view, which specifies the layout that it wants to extend.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter supports a simple, yet very flexible, layout system that makes it simple to use one or more base page layouts across your application. Layouts support sections of content that can be inserted from any view being rendered. You could create different layouts to support one-column, two-column, blog archive pages, and more. Layouts are never directly rendered. Instead, you render a view, which specifies the layout that it wants to extend.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter uses phpUnit as the basis for all of its testing. There are two ways to install phpUnit to use within your system.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter uses phpUnit as the basis for all of its testing. There are two ways to install phpUnit to use within your system.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter uses a few functions for its operation that are globally defined, and are available to you at any point. These do not require loading any libraries or helpers.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 작업에 전역 적으로 정의되어 있으며 언제든지 사용할 수있는 몇 가지 기능을 사용합니다. 라이브러리 나 헬퍼를로드 할 필요는 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter uses the Model-View-Controller approach, which allows great separation between logic and presentation. This is particularly good for projects in which designers are working with your template files, as the code these files contain will be minimized. We describe MVC in more detail on its own page.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 Model-View-Controller 접근 방식을 사용하여 논리와 표현을 크게 분리 할 수 ​​있습니다. 이는 파일에 포함 된 코드가 최소화되므로 디자이너가 템플릿 파일로 작업하는 프로젝트에 특히 유용합니다. 우리는 MVC를 자체 페이지에서 더 자세히 설명합니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter utilizes an approach to transactions that is very similar to the process used by the popular database class ADODB. We’ve chosen that approach because it greatly simplifies the process of running transactions. In most cases all that is required are two lines of code.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 널리 사용되는 데이터베이스 클래스 ADODB에서 사용하는 프로세스와 매우 유사한 트랜잭션 접근 방식을 사용합니다. 트랜잭션 실행 프로세스를 크게 단순화하기 때문에이 접근 방식을 선택했습니다. 대부분의 경우 필요한 것은 두 줄의 코드입니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter utilizes an approach to transactions that is very similar to the process used by the popular database class ADODB. We’ve chosen that approach because it greatly simplifies the process of running transactions. In most cases, all that is required is two lines of code.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter was originally developed by EllisLab. The framework was written for performance in the real world, with many of the original class libraries, helpers, and sub-systems borrowed from the code-base of ExpressionEngine. It was, for years, developed and maintained by EllisLab, the ExpressionEngine Development Team and a group of community members called the Reactor Team.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter was originally developed by EllisLab. The framework was written for performance in the real world, with many of the original class libraries, helpers, and sub-systems borrowed from the code-base of ExpressionEngine. It was, for years, developed and maintained by EllisLab, the ExpressionEngine Development Team and a group of community members called the Reactor Team.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter will usually make everything work out of the box. However, Sessions are a very sensitive component of any application, so some careful configuration must be done. Please take your time to consider all of the options and their effects.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter는 일반적으로 모든 것을 즉시 사용할 수 있도록합니다. 그러나 세션은 모든 응용 프로그램의 매우 민감한 구성 요소이므로 신중하게 구성해야합니다. 시간을내어 모든 옵션과 그 효과를 고려하십시오.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter’s CLI library makes creating interactive command-line scripts simple, including:
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter’s CLI library makes creating interactive command-line scripts simple, including:

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter’s Events feature provides a means to tap into and modify the inner workings of the framework without hacking core files. When CodeIgniter runs it follows a specific execution process. There may be instances, however, when you’d like to cause some action to take place at a particular stage in the execution process. For example, you might want to run a script right before your controllers get loaded, or right after, or you might want to trigger one of your own scripts in some other location.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter’s Events feature provides a means to tap into and modify the inner workings of the framework without hacking core files. When CodeIgniter runs it follows a specific execution process. There may be instances, however, when you’d like to cause some action to take place at a particular stage in the execution process. For example, you might want to run a script right before your controllers get loaded, or right after, or you might want to trigger one of your own scripts in some other location.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter’s FTP Class permits files to be transferred to a remote server. Remote files can also be moved, renamed, and deleted. The FTP class also includes a “mirroring” function that permits an entire local directory to be recreated remotely via FTP.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter의 FTP 클래스를 사용하면 파일을 원격 서버로 전송할 수 있습니다. 원격 파일을 이동하고 이름을 바꾸고 삭제할 수도 있습니다. FTP 클래스에는 전체 로컬 디렉토리를 FTP를 통해 원격으로 다시 작성할 수있는 "미러링"기능도 포함되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter’s File Uploading Class permits files to be uploaded. You can set various preferences, restricting the type and size of the files.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter의 파일 업로드 클래스를 사용하면 파일을 업로드 할 수 있습니다. 파일의 유형과 크기를 제한하여 다양한 환경 설정을 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter’s Hooks feature provides a means to tap into and modify the inner workings of the framework without hacking the core files. When CodeIgniter runs it follows a specific execution process, diagramed in the Application Flow page. There may be instances, however, where you’d like to cause some action to take place at a particular stage in the execution process. For example, you might want to run a script right before your controllers get loaded, or right after, or you might want to trigger one of your own scripts in some other location.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter의 후크 기능은 핵심 파일을 해킹하지 않고 프레임 워크의 내부 작업을 활용하고 수정할 수있는 방법을 제공합니다. CodeIgniter를 실행할 때 특정 실행 프로세스를 따르며 응용 프로그램 흐름 페이지에 나와 있습니다. 그러나 실행 프로세스의 특정 단계에서 일부 작업을 수행하려는 경우가있을 수 있습니다. 예를 들어 컨트롤러가로드되기 직전 또는 직후에 스크립트를 실행하거나 다른 위치에서 자체 스크립트 중 하나를 트리거 할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter’s Image Manipulation class lets you perform the following actions:

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter’s OpenSSL handler uses the AES-256-CTR cipher.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter’s OpenSSL handler uses the AES-256-CTR cipher.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter’s Pagination class is very easy to use, and it is 100% customizable, either dynamically or via stored preferences.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter의 페이지 매김 클래스는 사용하기가 매우 쉽고 동적으로 또는 저장된 환경 설정을 통해 100 % 사용자 정의 할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter’s Session library does NOT use the actual ‘redis’ session.save_handler. Take note only of the path format in the link above.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter’s Unit Test class is quite simple, consisting of an evaluation function and two result functions. It’s not intended to be a full-blown test suite but rather a simple mechanism to evaluate your code to determine if it is producing the correct data type and result.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter의 Unit Test 클래스는 평가 함수와 두 개의 결과 함수로 구성된 매우 간단합니다. 완전한 테스트 스위트가 아니라 코드를 평가하여 올바른 데이터 유형과 결과를 생성하는지 확인하는 간단한 메커니즘이 아닙니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter’s XML-RPC classes permit you to send requests to another server, or set up your own XML-RPC server to receive requests.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter의 XML-RPC 클래스를 사용하면 요청을 다른 서버로 보내거나 고유 한 XML-RPC 서버를 설정하여 요청을받을 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter’s Zip Encoding Class permits you to create Zip archives. Archives can be downloaded to your desktop or saved to a directory.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter의 Zip 인코딩 클래스를 사용하면 Zip 아카이브를 만들 수 있습니다. 아카이브는 데스크탑으로 다운로드하거나 디렉토리에 저장할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter’s core Controller should not be changed, but a default class extension is provided for you at app/Controllers/BaseController.php. Any new controllers you make should extend BaseController to take advantage of preloaded components and any additional functionality you provide:
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter’s core Controller should not be changed, but a default class extension is provided for you at app/Controllers/BaseController.php. Any new controllers you make should extend BaseController to take advantage of preloaded components and any additional functionality you provide:

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter’s database abstraction allows you to use transactions with databases that support transaction-safe table types. In MySQL, you’ll need to be running InnoDB or BDB table types rather than the more common MyISAM. Most other database platforms support transactions natively.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter의 데이터베이스 추상화를 통해 트랜잭션 안전 테이블 유형을 지원하는 데이터베이스와 트랜잭션을 사용할 수 있습니다. MySQL에서는 일반적인 MyISAM 대신 InnoDB 또는 BDB 테이블 유형을 실행해야합니다. 대부분의 다른 데이터베이스 플랫폼은 트랜잭션을 기본적으로 지원합니다.

trans-unit.source: CodeIgniter’s query caching system happens dynamically when your pages are viewed. When caching is enabled, the first time a web page is loaded, the query result object will be serialized and stored in a text file on your server. The next time the page is loaded the cache file will be used instead of accessing your database. Your database usage can effectively be reduced to zero for any pages that have been cached.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter의 쿼리 캐싱 시스템은 페이지를 볼 때 동적으로 발생합니다. 캐싱이 활성화되면 웹 페이지가 처음로드 될 때 쿼리 결과 개체가 직렬화되어 서버의 텍스트 파일에 저장됩니다. 다음에 페이지가로드 될 때 데이터베이스에 액세스하는 대신 캐시 파일이 사용됩니다. 캐시 된 모든 페이지에 대해 데이터베이스 사용량을 효과적으로 0으로 줄일 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Content negotiation is a way to determine what type of content to return to the client based on what the client can handle, and what the server can handle. This can be used to determine whether the client is wanting HTML or JSON returned, whether the image should be returned as a jpg or png, what type of compression is supported and more. This is done by analyzing four different headers which can each support multiple value options, each with their own priority. Trying to match this up manually can be pretty challenging. CodeIgniter provides the Negotiator class that can handle this for you.
trans-unit.target: Content negotiation is a way to determine what type of content to return to the client based on what the client can handle, and what the server can handle. This can be used to determine whether the client is wanting HTML or JSON returned, whether the image should be returned as a jpg or png, what type of compression is supported and more. This is done by analyzing four different headers which can each support multiple value options, each with their own priority. Trying to match this up manually can be pretty challenging. CodeIgniter provides the Negotiator class that can handle this for you.

trans-unit.source: Continuing down, you can see a condition that checks whether the form validation ran successfully. If it did not, the form is displayed; if it was submitted and passed all the rules, the model is called. This takes care of passing the news item into the model. This function - provided by the URL helper - strips down the string you pass it, replacing all spaces by dashes (-) and makes sure everything is in lowercase characters. This leaves you with a nice slug, perfect for creating URIs.
trans-unit.target: Continuing down, you can see a condition that checks whether the form validation ran successfully. This function - provided by the URL helper - strips down the string you pass it, replacing all spaces by dashes (-) and makes sure everything is in lowercase characters. This leaves you with a nice slug, perfect for creating URIs.

trans-unit.source: Controllers have a couple of different roles to play. The most obvious one is that they receive input from the user and then determine what to do with it. This often involves passing the data to a model to save it, or requesting data from the model that is then passed on to the view to be displayed. This also includes loading up other utility classes, if needed, to handle specialized tasks that is outside of the purview of the model.

trans-unit.source: Database seeding is a simple way to add data into your database. It is especially useful during development where you need to populate the database with sample data that you can develop against, but it is not limited to that. Seeds can contain static data that you don’t want to include in a migration, like countries, or geo-coding tables, event or setting information, and more.
trans-unit.target: Database seeding is a simple way to add data into your database. It is especially useful during development where you need to populate the database with sample data that you can develop against, but it is not limited to that. Seeds can contain static data that you don’t want to include in a migration, like countries, or geo-coding tables, event or setting information, and more.

trans-unit.source: Database seeds are simple classes that must have a run() method, and extend CodeIgniterDatabaseSeeder. Within the run() the class can create any form of data that it needs to. It has access to the database connection and the forge through $this->db and $this->forge, respectively. Seed files must be stored within the app/Database/Seeds directory. The name of the file must match the name of the class.
trans-unit.target: Database seeds are simple classes that must have a run() method, and extend CodeIgniterDatabaseSeeder. Within the run() the class can create any form of data that it needs to. It has access to the database connection and the forge through $this->db and $this->forge , respectively. Seed files must be stored within the app/Database/Seeds directory. The name of the file must match the name of the class.

trans-unit.source: Different modes of encryption have different characteristics and serve for different purposes. Some are stronger than others, some are faster and some offer extra features. We are not going in depth into that here, we’ll leave that to the cryptography experts. The table below is to provide brief informational reference to our more experienced users. If you are a beginner, just stick to the CBC mode - it is widely accepted as strong and secure for general purposes.
trans-unit.target: 다른 암호화 모드는 다른 특성을 가지며 다른 목적으로 사용됩니다. 일부는 다른 것보다 강력하고 일부는 더 빠르며 일부는 추가 기능을 제공합니다. 우리는 여기에 깊이 들어 가지 않고 암호화 전문가에게 맡길 것입니다. 아래 표는 숙련 된 사용자에게 간단한 정보를 제공하기위한 것입니다. 초보자라면 CBC 모드를 고수하면됩니다. 일반적인 용도로는 강력하고 안전합니다.

trans-unit.source: Driver files must be stored in a subdirectory within the main “libraries” directory, or within your personal application/libraries directory. The subdirectory must match the parent class name. Read the Drivers description for details.

trans-unit.source: Drivers are a special type of Library that has a parent class and any number of potential child classes. Child classes have access to the parent class, but not their siblings. Drivers provide an elegant syntax in your controllers for libraries that benefit from or require being broken down into discrete classes.
trans-unit.target: 드라이버는 부모 클래스와 여러 잠재적 인 자식 클래스가있는 특수한 유형의 라이브러리입니다. 자식 클래스는 부모 클래스에 액세스 할 수 있지만 형제는 액세스 할 수 없습니다. 드라이버는 컨트롤러 에서 개별 클래스로 세분화해야하는 라이브러리를위한 훌륭한 구문을 제공합니다 .

trans-unit.source: Drivers are found in the system/libraries/ directory, in their own sub-directory which is identically named to the parent library class. Also inside that directory is a subdirectory named drivers, which contains all of the possible child class files.
trans-unit.target: 드라이버는 system / libraries / 디렉토리의 상위 라이브러리 클래스와 동일한 이름의 자체 하위 디렉토리에 있습니다. 또한 그 디렉토리 안에는 가능한 모든 하위 클래스 파일을 포함하는 drivers라는 서브 디렉토리가 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Dropping a Column From a Table
Drops a column from a table. Usage: See Dropping a Column From a Table.
trans-unit.target: 테이블에서 열을 삭제합니다. 사용법 : 테이블에서 열 삭제를 참조하십시오 .

trans-unit.source: Drops a database. Usage: See Creating and Dropping Databases.
trans-unit.target: 데이터베이스를 삭제합니다. 사용법 : 데이터베이스 작성 및 삭제를 참조하십시오 .

trans-unit.source: Drops a table. Usage: See Dropping a table.
trans-unit.target: 테이블을 삭제합니다. 사용법 : 테이블 삭제를 참조하십시오 .

trans-unit.source: Drops single or multiple columns from a table. Usage: See Dropping Columns From a Table.
trans-unit.target: 테이블에서 단일 또는 다중 열을 삭제합니다. 사용법 : 테이블에서 열 삭제를 참조하십시오 .

trans-unit.source: Due to security issues of blindly trusting the HTTP_REFERER system variable, CodeIgniter will store previously visited pages in the session if it’s available. This ensures that we always use a known and trusted source. If the session hasn’t been loaded, or is otherwise unavailable, then a sanitized version of HTTP_REFERER will be used.
trans-unit.target: HTTP_REFERER 시스템 변수를 맹목적으로 신뢰하는 보안 문제로 인해 CodeIgniter는 사용 가능한 경우 이전에 방문한 페이지를 세션에 저장합니다. 이를 통해 우리는 항상 알려지고 신뢰할 수있는 소스를 사용할 수 있습니다. 세션이로드되지 않았거나 사용할 수없는 경우 HTTP_REFERER의 삭제 된 버전이 사용됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Due to the limited execution time and memory available to PHP, backing up very large databases may not be possible. If your database is very large you might need to backup directly from your SQL server via the command line, or have your server admin do it for you if you do not have root privileges.
trans-unit.target: PHP에서 사용할 수있는 실행 시간과 메모리가 제한되어 있기 때문에 매우 큰 데이터베이스를 백업하지 못할 수 있습니다. 데이터베이스가 매우 큰 경우 명령 줄을 통해 SQL 서버에서 직접 백업하거나 루트 권한이없는 경우 서버 관리자가 자동으로 백업하도록해야합니다.

trans-unit.source: During system initialization all global variables that are found to exist in the $_GET, $_POST, $_REQUEST and $_COOKIE are unset.
trans-unit.target: 시스템을 초기화하는 동안 $_GET , $_POST , $_REQUEST 및 $_COOKIE 있는 모든 전역 변수 가 설정 해제됩니다.

trans-unit.source: During testing, you might not want the events to actually fire, as sending out hundreds of emails a day is both slow and counter-productive. You can tell the Events class to only simulate running the events with the simulate() method. When true, all events will be skipped over during the trigger method. Everything else will work as normal, though.
trans-unit.target: 테스트 중에는 하루에 수백 개의 이메일을 보내는 것이 느리고 비생산적이기 때문에 이벤트가 실제로 발생하는 것을 원하지 않을 수 있습니다. simulate() 메서드를 사용 하여 이벤트 실행 만 시뮬레이션하도록 Events 클래스에 지시 할 수 있습니다 . 때 사실 , 모든 이벤트가 트리거 방법 중 스킵됩니다. 하지만 다른 모든 것은 정상적으로 작동합니다.

trans-unit.source: Each request() call returns a Response object that contains a lot of useful information and some helpful methods. The most commonly used methods let you determine the response itself.
trans-unit.target: 각 request() 호출은 많은 유용한 정보와 몇 가지 유용한 메서드를 포함하는 Response 객체를 반환합니다. 가장 일반적으로 사용되는 방법을 통해 응답 자체를 결정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Each Migration is run in numeric order forward or backwards depending on the method taken. Each migration is numbered using the timestamp when the migration was created, in YYYYMMDDHHIISS format (e.g. 20121031100537). This helps prevent numbering conflicts when working in a team environment.
trans-unit.target: 각 마이그레이션은 수행 한 방법에 따라 숫자 순서로 앞뒤로 실행됩니다. 각 마이그레이션은 마이그레이션이 생성 될 때 타임 스탬프를 사용하여 YYYYMMDDHHIISS 형식 (예 : 20121031100537 )으로 번호가 지정됩니다. 이렇게하면 팀 환경에서 작업 할 때 번호 매기기 충돌을 방지 할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Each Migration is run in numeric order forward or backwards depending on the method taken. Two numbering styles are available:
trans-unit.target: 각 마이그레이션은 수행 된 방법에 따라 숫자 순서로 앞뒤로 실행됩니다. 두 가지 번호 매기기 스타일을 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Each cookie is returned as an associative array.
Each file can be moved to its new location with the aptly named move() method. This takes the directory to move the file to as the first parameter:
trans-unit.target: 각 파일은 적절한 이름의 move() 메서드 를 사용하여 새 위치로 이동할 수 있습니다 . 이것은 파일을 이동할 디렉토리를 첫 번째 매개 변수로 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: Each file can be moved to its new location with the aptly named store() method.
trans-unit.target: 각 파일은 적절한 이름의 store() 메서드 를 사용하여 새 위치로 이동할 수 있습니다 .

trans-unit.source: Each folder name will be an array index, while its contained files will be numerically indexed. Here is an example of a typical array:
trans-unit.target: 각 폴더 이름은 배열 색인이며 포함 된 파일은 숫자로 색인화됩니다. 다음은 일반적인 배열의 예입니다.

trans-unit.source: Each language should be stored in its own folder. For example, the English files are located at: system/language/english
trans-unit.target: 각 언어는 자체 폴더에 저장해야합니다. 예를 들어 영어 파일은 system / language / english에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Each name in the query MUST be surrounded by colons.
Each namespace has it’s own version sequence, this will help you upgrade and downgrade each module (namespace) without affecting other namespaces.
trans-unit.target: 각 네임 스페이스에는 고유 한 버전 시퀀스가 ​​있으므로 다른 네임 스페이스에 영향을주지 않고 각 모듈 (네임 스페이스)을 업그레이드하고 다운 그레이드 할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Each of the “routes” is a 3 element array containing the HTTP verb (or “add” for all), the URI to match, and the routing destination.
trans-unit.target: 각 "routes"는 HTTP 동사 (또는 모두에 대해 "add"), 일치시킬 URI 및 라우팅 대상을 포함하는 3 개 요소 배열입니다.

trans-unit.source: Each of the other idiom-specific directories would contain the core language files that you obtained from the translations repositories, or that you translated yourself, as well as any additional ones needed by your application.
trans-unit.target: 다른 관용구 별 디렉토리 각각에는 번역 저장소에서 얻거나 직접 번역 한 핵심 언어 파일과 응용 프로그램에 필요한 추가 파일이 포함됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Each of this functions will affect the visibility of an item on your page. hide() will set an item invisible, show() will reveal it.
trans-unit.target: 이 기능은 각각 페이지의 항목 표시에 영향을줍니다. hide ()는 보이지 않는 항목을 설정하고 show ()는 표시합니다.

trans-unit.source: Each of your applications will need its own index.php file which calls the desired application. The index.php file can be named anything you want.
trans-unit.target: 각 응용 프로그램에는 원하는 응용 프로그램을 호출하는 자체 index.php 파일이 필요합니다. index.php 파일은 원하는 이름으로 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Each of your sub-directories may contain a default controller which will be called if the URL contains only the sub-directory. Simply put a controller in there that matches the name of your ‘default_controller’ as specified in your app/Config/Routes.php file.
trans-unit.target: 각 하위 디렉토리에는 URL 에 하위 디렉토리 만 포함 된 경우 호출되는 기본 컨트롤러가 포함될 수 있습니다 . app / Config / Routes.php 파일에 지정된대로 'default_controller'의 이름과 일치하는 컨트롤러를 거기에 넣으면 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Each of your sub-directories may contain a default controller which will be called if the URL contains only the sub-directory. Simply put a controller in there that matches the name of your ‘default_controller’ as specified in your application/config/routes.php file.
trans-unit.target: 각 하위 디렉토리에는 URL 에 하위 디렉토리 만 포함 된 경우 호출되는 기본 컨트롤러가 포함될 수 있습니다 . application / config / routes.php 파일에 지정된 'default_controller'의 이름과 일치하는 컨트롤러를 넣으십시오 .

trans-unit.source: Each query object stores several pieces of information about the query itself. This is used, in part, by the Timeline feature, but is available for your use as well.
trans-unit.target: 각 쿼리 개체는 쿼리 자체에 대한 여러 정보를 저장합니다. 이것은 부분적으로 타임 라인 기능에서 사용되지만 사용자도 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Each section of Profiler data can be enabled or disabled by setting a corresponding config variable to TRUE or FALSE. This can be done one of two ways. First, you can set application wide defaults with the application/config/profiler.php config file.
trans-unit.target: 해당 구성 변수를 TRUE 또는 FALSE로 설정하여 프로파일 러 데이터의 각 섹션을 활성화 또는 비활성화 할 수 있습니다. 이것은 두 가지 방법 중 하나를 수행 할 수 있습니다. 먼저 application / config / profiler.php 구성 파일을 사용하여 응용 프로그램 전체 기본값을 설정할 수 있습니다 .

trans-unit.source: Each section of the path between the slashes is a single segment. The URI class provides a simple way to determine what the values of the segments are. The segments start at 1 being the furthest left of the path.
trans-unit.target: 슬래시 사이의 각 경로 섹션은 단일 세그먼트입니다. URI 클래스는 세그먼트의 값을 결정하는 간단한 방법을 제공합니다. 세그먼트는 경로의 가장 왼쪽에있는 1에서 시작합니다.

trans-unit.source: Each view parameter (which we refer to as a pseudo-variable) triggers a substitution, based on the type of value you provided for it. Pseudo-variables are not extracted into PHP variables; instead their value is accessed through the pseudo-variable syntax, where its name is referenced inside braces.
trans-unit.target: 각 뷰 매개 변수 (의사 변수라고 함)는 제공 한 값의 유형에 따라 대체를 트리거합니다. 의사 변수는 PHP 변수로 추출되지 않습니다. 대신 해당 값은 의사 변수 구문을 통해 액세스되며, 여기서 해당 이름은 중괄호 안에 참조됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Earlier you set up a controller with a view() method. The method accepts one parameter, which is the name of the page to be loaded. The static page bodies will be located in the app/Views/pages/ directory.
trans-unit.target: 이전에 view() 메서드 로 컨트롤러를 설정했습니다 . 메소드는로드 할 페이지의 이름 인 하나의 매개 변수를 허용합니다. 정적 페이지 본문은 app / Views / pages / 디렉토리에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Earlier you set up a controller with a view() method. The method accepts one parameter, which is the name of the page to be loaded. The static page templates will be located in the application/views/pages/ directory.
trans-unit.target: 이전에는 view() 메소드 로 컨트롤러를 설정했습니다 . 이 메소드는로드 할 페이지의 이름 인 하나의 매개 변수를 승인합니다. 정적 페이지 템플리트는 application / views / pages / 디렉토리에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Easy to add third party authentication
Edit application/config/production/config.php so it contains your production settings
trans-unit.target: 프로덕션 설정을 포함하도록 application / config / production / config.php를 편집하십시오.
기본 프레임 워크 동작에 대한 영향

trans-unit.source: Either the cache object, or the item retrieved from the cache
trans-unit.target: 캐시 개체 또는 캐시에서 검색된 항목

trans-unit.source: Elapsed time of Benchmark points and total execution time
trans-unit.target: 벤치 마크 포인트 경과 시간 및 총 실행 시간
이메일 우선 순위. 1 = 최고 5 = 최저 3 = 정상입니다.

trans-unit.source: Email Sending Class. Supports Attachments, HTML/Text email, multiple protocols (sendmail, SMTP, and Mail) and more.
trans-unit.target: 이메일 발송 수업. 첨부 파일, HTML / 텍스트 이메일, 여러 프로토콜 (Sendmail, SMTP 및 Mail) 등을 지원합니다.

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable automatically running migrations.
trans-unit.target: 자동 실행 마이그레이션을 활성화 또는 비활성화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Enable the caching feature, either globally by setting the preference in your application/config/database.php file, or manually as described below.
trans-unit.target: application / config / database.php 파일에서 환경 설정을 설정하여 전역 적으로 또는 아래 설명 된대로 수동으로 캐싱 기능을 사용하십시오.

trans-unit.source: Enabled migrations by default in app/Config/Migrations
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로 app / Config / Migrations에서 마이그레이션을 활성화했습니다.

trans-unit.source: Enables you to call private methods from outside the class. This returns a function that can be called. The first parameter is an instance of the class to test. The second parameter is the name of the method you want to call.
trans-unit.target: 클래스 외부에서 개인 메서드를 호출 할 수 있습니다. 호출 할 수있는 함수를 반환합니다. 첫 번째 매개 변수는 테스트 할 클래스의 인스턴스입니다. 두 번째 매개 변수는 호출하려는 메소드의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: Enables you to censor words within a text string. The first parameter will contain the original string. The second will contain an array of words which you disallow. The third (optional) parameter can contain a replacement value for the words. If not specified they are replaced with pound signs: ####.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트 문자열 내에서 단어를 검열 할 수 있습니다. 첫 번째 매개 변수는 원래 문자열을 포함합니다. 두 번째는 허용하지 않는 단어 배열을 포함합니다. 세 번째 (선택적) 매개 변수는 단어의 대체 값을 포함 할 수 있습니다. 지정하지 않으면 파운드 기호 (####)로 대체됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Enables you to re-encode data that was originally encrypted with CodeIgniter 1.x to be compatible with the Encrypt library in CodeIgniter 2.x. It is only necessary to use this method if you have encrypted data stored permanently such as in a file or database and are on a server that supports Mcrypt. “Light” use encryption such as encrypted session data or transitory encrypted flashdata require no intervention on your part. However, existing encrypted Sessions will be destroyed since data encrypted prior to 2.x will not be decoded.
trans-unit.target: CodeIgniter 1.x로 암호화 된 데이터를 CodeIgniter 2.x의 암호화 라이브러리와 호환되도록 다시 인코딩 할 수 있습니다. 파일이나 데이터베이스와 같이 영구적으로 저장된 데이터를 암호화하고 Mcrypt를 지원하는 서버에있는 경우에만이 방법을 사용해야합니다. "경량"은 암호화 된 세션 데이터 또는 일시적인 암호화 된 플래시 데이터와 같은 암호화를 사용하므로 사용자의 개입이 필요하지 않습니다. 그러나 2.x 이전에 암호화 된 데이터는 디코딩되지 않으므로 기존의 암호화 된 세션은 삭제됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Enables you to send an attachment. Put the file path/name in the first parameter. For multiple attachments use the method multiple times. For example:
trans-unit.target: 첨부 파일을 보낼 수 있습니다. 첫 번째 매개 변수에 파일 경로 / 이름을 입력하십시오. 여러 첨부 파일의 경우이 방법을 여러 번 사용하십시오. 예를 들면 다음과 같습니다.

trans-unit.source: Enables/disables parsing of the {elapsed_time} and {memory_usage} pseudo-variables.
trans-unit.target: {elapsed_time} 및 {memory_usage} 유사 변수의 구문 분석을 활성화 / 비활성화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Enables/disables strict type comparison in tests.
trans-unit.target: 테스트에서 엄격한 유형 비교를 활성화 / 비활성화합니다.
프로파일 러 섹션 활성화 및 비활성화

trans-unit.source: Encoding, and encryption too, are two-way processes. Passwords are secrets that must only be known to their owner, and thus must work only in one direction. Hashing does that - there’s no un-hashing or de-hashing, but there is decoding and decryption.
trans-unit.target: 인코딩 및 암호화 역시 양방향 프로세스입니다. 암호는 소유자에게만 알려 져야하는 비밀이므로 한 방향으로 만 작동해야합니다. 없다 - 해싱는 않습니다 더 해제 해싱 또는 드 해시,하지만 거기에 디코딩 및 복호화한다.

trans-unit.source: Encrypt the data via AES-128 in CBC mode (or another previously configured cipher and mode), using the above-mentioned derived encryption key and IV.
trans-unit.target: 위에서 언급 한 파생 암호화 키와 IV를 사용하여 CBC 모드 (또는 이전에 구성된 다른 암호 및 모드)에서 AES-128을 통해 데이터를 암호화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Encrypted data or FALSE on failure
trans-unit.target: 암호화 된 데이터 또는 실패시 FALSE

trans-unit.source: Encrypting and decrypting data with the already configured library settings is simple. As simple as just passing the string to the encrypt() and/or decrypt() methods:
trans-unit.target: 이미 구성된 라이브러리 설정으로 데이터를 암호화 및 해독하는 것은 간단합니다. 문자열을 encrypt() 및 / 또는 decrypt() 메소드에 전달하는 것만 큼 간단 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Encryption Service handlers must implement CodeIgniter’s simple EncrypterInterface. Using an appropriate PHP cryptographic extension or third-party library may require additional software is installed on your server and/or might need to be explicitly enabled in your instance of PHP.
trans-unit.target: 암호화 서비스 핸들러는 CodeIgniter의 간단한 EncrypterInterface 를 구현해야합니다 . 적절한 PHP 암호화 확장 또는 타사 라이브러리를 사용하려면 서버에 추가 소프트웨어를 설치해야하거나 PHP 인스턴스에서 명시 적으로 활성화해야 할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Encryption algorithm (see Supported encryption ciphers and modes).
trans-unit.target: 암호화 알고리즘 ( 지원되는 암호화 암호 및 모드 참조 )

trans-unit.source: Encrypts the input data and returns its ciphertext.
Ends a group expression for HAVING clause.
trans-unit.target: HAVING 절에 대한 그룹 표현식을 종료합니다.

trans-unit.source: Ends the current group by adding a closing parenthesis to the HAVING clause of the query.
trans-unit.target: 쿼리의 HAVING 절에 닫는 괄호를 추가하여 현재 그룹을 종료합니다.

trans-unit.source: Ends the current group by adding a closing parenthesis to the WHERE clause of the query.
trans-unit.target: 쿼리의 WHERE 절에 닫는 괄호를 추가하여 현재 그룹을 종료합니다.

trans-unit.source: Ends the current group by adding an closing parenthesis to the WHERE clause of the query.
trans-unit.target: 쿼리의 WHERE 절에 닫는 괄호를 추가하여 현재 그룹을 종료합니다.

trans-unit.source: Enjoy your exploration of the CodeIgniter framework.
Ensure that a header or cookie was actually emitted:
trans-unit.target: 헤더 또는 쿠키가 실제로 방출되었는지 확인하십시오.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that a header or cookie was not emitted:
trans-unit.target: 헤더 또는 쿠키가 생성되지 않았는지 확인하십시오.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that an event you expected to be triggered actually was:
trans-unit.target: 트리거 될 것으로 예상 한 이벤트가 실제로 다음과 같은지 확인하십시오.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that something you expected to be logged actually was:
trans-unit.target: 실제로 기록 될 것으로 예상 한 내용이 다음과 같은지 확인하십시오.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that you have Composer installed on your system. From the project root (the directory that contains the application and system directories) type the following from the command line:
trans-unit.target: 시스템에 Composer가 설치되어 있는지 확인하십시오. 프로젝트 루트 (응용 프로그램 및 시스템 디렉터리가 포함 된 디렉터리)에서 명령 줄에 다음을 입력합니다.

trans-unit.source: Environment Variables should also be used for anything private such as passwords, API keys, or other sensitive data.
trans-unit.target: 환경 변수는 암호, API 키 또는 기타 민감한 데이터와 같은 개인 정보에도 사용해야합니다.

trans-unit.source: Error Messages. These are actual errors, such as PHP errors or user errors.
trans-unit.target: 오류 메시지. PHP 오류 또는 사용자 오류와 같은 실제 오류입니다.

trans-unit.source: Escape SQL identifiers, such as column, table and names.
trans-unit.target: 열, 테이블 및 이름과 같은 SQL 식별자를 이스케이프합니다.

trans-unit.source: Escape all data before database insertion
trans-unit.target: 데이터베이스 삽입 전에 모든 데이터를 이스케이프 처리

trans-unit.source: Escape the data before submitting it into your database or outputting it to a browser.
trans-unit.target: 데이터베이스에 제출하거나 브라우저로 출력하기 전에 데이터를 이스케이프하십시오.

trans-unit.source: Escapes data for inclusion in web pages, to help prevent XSS attacks. This uses the Laminas Escaper library to handle the actual filtering of the data.
trans-unit.target: XSS 공격을 방지하기 위해 웹 페이지에 포함하기 위해 데이터를 이스케이프합니다. 이것은 Laminas Escaper 라이브러리를 사용하여 데이터의 실제 필터링을 처리합니다.

trans-unit.source: Escapes input data based on type, including boolean and NULLs.
trans-unit.target: 부울 및 NULL을 포함하여 유형에 따라 입력 데이터를 이스케이프합니다.
